Name: Run Button
text: Click here to run your program.

Name: Set Color
text: Click here to change the color turtle uses to draw.

Name: Set Width
text: Use this block to change the width of the brush.

Name: Move Backwards
text: Use this block to move backwards.

Name: Show Code
text: Click here to see your code.

Name: Categories
text: Find your blocks organized under these categories.

Name: Move Forward
text: Use the move forward block to move the zombie.

Name: Trashcan
text: Get rid of unwanted blocks here.

Name: Show Code
text: Click here to see the code you are generating.

Name: Procedures
text: Find a function definition block in the procedures category.
